text: Each operator processes its input all at once and then emits its output all at once. — The operator "materializes" its output as a single result. — The DBMS can push down hints into to avoid scanning too many tuples. — Can send either a materialized row or a single column. The output can be either whole tuples (NSM) or subsets of columns (DSM) £2CMUDB | | , . w E ce e 5 e - - = I D Pl % 1319/1:0537 - MATERIALIZATION MODEL > 8 - S 0800 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
